episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including a scientist studying cosmic dust, the rigorous training of power line workers, the high value of a cow named Posh Spice, and a U.S. senator's love for Batman movies.

facts.fact: There is a scientist at Imperial College who's been studying the same bag of dust for 15 years.
Every year power line repair workers have to pass a test where they rescue a 12 stone dummy from the top of a telegraph pole.
The most expensive cow in the UK is called Posh Spice.
The person who has acted in more Batman movie reboots than anyone else is also the third in line to be President of the United States.
